dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: A stormy night. Rain beats against the windows of the old villa...

dialogues.speaker: Detective Kane
dialogues.text: Something doesn't add up in this house. I can feel it.

dialogues.speaker: Butler
dialogues.text: Welcome, Detective. The lady of the house awaits you in the library.

dialogues.speaker: Detective Kane
dialogues.text: Thank you. But first, I have some questions for you...

dialogues.speaker: Butler
dialogues.text: Of course. I'm here to cooperate.

dialogues.speaker: Lady Blackwood
dialogues.text: Detective Kane, what a pleasure to see you again. Although the circumstances are... unpleasant.

dialogues.speaker: Detective Kane
dialogues.text: Lady Blackwood. I'm sorry for your loss. Let's talk about the discovery.

dialogues.speaker: Lady Blackwood
dialogues.text: The body was found in the greenhouse this morning. It's terrible...

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The greenhouse. A place of beauty now stained by tragedy.

dialogues.speaker: Detective Kane
dialogues.text: The footprints... they lead to the back garden.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The mystery thickens. Who is the culprit?

dialogues.speaker: Detective Kane
dialogues.text: I've collected all the clues. It's time to solve this case.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Thanks for playing this Retronovel demo!
